Detailed Description

GUIDO tag with name and a list of arguments given as lgTagArg.

int lgTag::splitRange (  void   ) 
 

split (...) into if tag has a range, and return 1 if range has been converted

split (..) ranges into ranges if the lastInRange and prevEv events are located in different voices (should never happen) the \...end should be placed in the voice of lastInRange!
